def sol(n, m, k, a, b):
    ka = 0
    kb = 0
    a = list(a)
    b = list(b)
    a.sort()
    b.sort()
    ai = 0
    bi = 0
    c = []
    while len(a) > ai and len(b) > bi:
        if a[ai] <= b[bi] and ka < k or kb >= k:
            c.append(a[ai])
            ai += 1
            kb = 0
            ka += 1
        elif a[ai] > b[bi] and kb < k or ka >= k:
            c.append(b[bi])
            bi += 1
            ka = 0
            kb += 1
    return ''.join(c)

def lex_string(n, m, a, b, k):
    a = list(a)
    b = list(b)
    c = ''
    a.sort(key=lambda x: ord(x), reverse=True)
    b.sort(key=lambda x: ord(x), reverse=True)
    i = n - 1
    j = m - 1
    k_a = 0
    k_b = 0
    while i >= 0 and j >= 0:
        a_element = a[i]
        b_element = b[j]
        if a_element < b_element:
            if k_a < k:
                c += a.pop()
                k_a += 1
                k_b = 0
                i -= 1
            else:
                c += b.pop()
                k_b += 1
                k_a = 0
                j -= 1
        elif k_b < k:
            c += b.pop()
            k_b += 1
            k_a = 0
            j -= 1
        else:
            c += a.pop()
            k_a += 1
            k_b = 0
            i -= 1
    return c

    t = input()

        (n, m, k) = input().split()

        print(c)

def solve(a, b, k):
    A = list(a)
    B = list(b)
    C = []
    n = len(A)
    m = len(B)
    A.sort()
    B.sort()
    i = 0
    j = 0
    op = A if A[0] < B[0] else B
    op_n = 0
    switch = False
    while i < n and j < m:
        if switch:
            if op is A:
                c = B[j]
                j += 1
                op = B
                op_n = 1
            else:
                c = A[i]
                i += 1
                op = A
                op_n = 1
            switch = False
        elif A[i] < B[j]:
            c = A[i]
            i += 1
            if op is B:
                op = A
                op_n = 1
            else:
                op_n += 1
        else:
            c = B[j]
            j += 1
            if op is A:
                op = B
                op_n = 1
            else:
                op_n += 1
        if op_n == k:
            switch = True
        C.append(c)
    return ''.join(C)

    b = ''.join(sorted(b))
    i = j = counta = countb = 0
    ans = ''
    while i < n and j < m:
        if a[i] < b[j]:
            if counta < k:
                countb = 0
                ans += a[i]
                counta += 1
                i += 1
            else:
                counta = 0
                ans += b[j]
                j += 1
                countb = 1
        elif countb < k:
            ans += b[j]
            countb += 1
            j += 1
            counta = 0
        else:
            countb = 0
            ans += a[i]
            i += 1
            counta = 1
    return ans

def solution(a, b, k):
    a = sorted(a)
    b = sorted(b)
    c = ''
    counter = 0
    current_is_a = True
    while a != [] and b != []:
        if counter == k:
            if current_is_a:
                c = c + b[0]
                b = b[1:]
                current_is_a = False
                counter = 1
                continue
            else:
                c = c + a[0]
                a = a[1:]
                current_is_a = True
                counter = 1
                continue
        if a[0] < b[0]:
            c = c + a[0]
            a = a[1:]
            if current_is_a:
                counter += 1
            else:
                counter = 1
                current_is_a = True
        else:
            c = c + b[0]
            b = b[1:]
            if not current_is_a:
                counter += 1
            else:
                counter = 1
                current_is_a = False
    return c

    print(solution(input(), input(), k))

def rec(a, b, k):
    c = ''
    i = 0
    j = 0
    k1 = k
    k2 = k
    while i < len(a) and j < len(b):
        if a[i] <= b[j]:
            if k1 != 0:
                c += a[i]
                k1 -= 1
                k2 = k
                i += 1
            else:
                c += b[j]
                k2 -= 1
                k1 = k
                j += 1
        elif k2 != 0:
            c += b[j]
            k2 -= 1
            k1 = k
            j += 1
        else:
            c += a[i]
            k1 -= 1
            k2 = k
            i += 1
    return c

def lex(a, b, k):
    n = len(a)
    m = len(b)
    a = ''.join(sorted(a))
    b = ''.join(sorted(b))
    c = ''
    i = 0
    j = 0
    ak = 0
    bk = 0
    while i < n and j < m:
        if ak < k and (a[i] < b[j] or bk == k):
            c += a[i]
            i += 1
            ak += 1
            bk = 0
        else:
            c += b[j]
            j += 1
            bk += 1
            ak = 0
    return c

input = sys.stdin.readline

def solve():
    (n, m, k) = map(int, input().split())
    a = list(input().strip())
    b = list(input().strip())
    a.sort()
    b.sort()
    ans = []
    prev = -1
    cnt = 0
    i = j = 0
    while i < n and j < m:
        (c1, c2) = (a[i], b[j])
        if c1 < c2:
            if prev == 0:
                cnt += 1
                if cnt > k:
                    ans.append(c2)
                    prev = cnt = 1
                    j += 1
                else:
                    ans.append(c1)
                    i += 1
            else:
                cnt = 1
                prev = 0
                ans.append(c1)
                i += 1
        elif prev == 1:
            cnt += 1
            if cnt > k:
                ans.append(c1)
                i += 1
                prev = 0
                cnt = 1
            else:
                ans.append(c2)
                j += 1
        else:
            cnt = 1
            prev = 1
            ans.append(c2)
            j += 1
    return ''.join(ans)

            i += 1
            c1 += 1
            c2 = 0

            j += 1
            c2 += 1
            c1 = 0
